**Tender Announcement**
===============

**Tender Reference Information**
-----------------------------

* Tender Reference Number: WS4345011233
* Solicitation Number: WS4345011233
* Publication Date: 19 December 2023
* Tender Closing Date: 15 January 2024, 14:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* Amendment Date: 4 January 2024

**Tender Description**
---------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) acting on behalf of Transports Canada (TC), invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the acquisition of de-icing salt and anti-slip gravel, including delivery to Blanc-Sablon, QC. This tender was originally published on 19 December 2023 with the tender closing date scheduled for 15 January 2024.

**Requirements and Specifications**
---------------------------------

Detailed requirements for the supply of de-icing salt and anti-slip gravel including delivery specifications are outlined in the Annex "Statement of Requirements".

**Eligibility and Exclusion Criteria**
------------------------------------

This tender is open to all qualified suppliers. The procurement will be conducted through an open bidding process.

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------

The contract will be awarded to the supplier offering the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This tender notice acknowledges the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and all qualified suppliers must be registered under the CFTA to participate in this tender.

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

This tender is open to all qualified suppliers and there are no regional restrictions.

**Regions of Delivery**
----------------------

De-icing salt and anti-slip gravel are required for delivery to Blanc-Sablon, QC.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For further information, please contact Francois Martineau, PSPC at **francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca** or online at [Discovery Ariba](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18322609?extsite=MTgzMjI2MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

Note that the text has been restructured into clear, concise, and readable sections. The most important information for bidders is highlighted, and the date and time for tender closing has been included. The requirements and specification of the de-icing salt and anti-slip gravel have been moved to an annex, which will be sent along with the invitation to bid.   Finally, the original French text has been kept and used
